strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates using an XML-specified details view
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
XML Details View Demo Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget has a details view that's specified using XML. To open the details view, click the text in the main view.
Within details view, select an item from the listbox. The details view will then close, and the name of the selected item will be shown in the main view.
strings.CHOOSE_ITEM: Choose an item by clicking it:
